mapper.select: select acc.id as id, acc.type as accessoryType, acc.product_name as accessoryName, acc.price as price from ope_customer_accessories acc where acc.type = #{type}

select product.id as id, product.fr_name as name, product.model as productModel, sheet.sales_price as price, product.color as color from ope_parts_product product inner join ope_regional_price_sheet sheet on sheet.parts_product_id = product.id and sheet.currency_unit = 1 where product_type = 4 and product.model = #{modelCode}

select product.id as id, product.fr_name as name, product.model as productModel, product.color as color, sheet.sales_price as price from ope_parts_product product left join ope_regional_price_sheet sheet on sheet.parts_product_id = product.id and sheet.currency_unit = 1 where product_type = 4 and product.id=#{productId}
